bug.author: tc87
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
A community member noticed a "cannot hash of type" issue. More information can be found in <denchmark-link:https://discuss.streamlit.io/t/hash-function-error-for-uploaded-text-file/2058>this forum discussion</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-h:h1>Full error message</denchmark-h>
This is the error the community member received: UnhashableType: Cannot hash object of type _io.StringIO
